Flow.description: US # 936465 - This flow is using to Close the SA.
Flow.label: Closeout SA

validationRule.errorMessage: Work End Time should not be null and should not less then Work Start Time

fields.name: WorkStime
fields.fieldText: Work Start Time : {!SA_Record.ActualStartTime}

validationRule.errorMessage: Work End Date should be greater then Work Start Date

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText: Facing the Error : {!FlowError}

validationRule.errorMessage: Projected Restart Date/Time should not be null and should not be in the past.

fields.name: CloseoutError
fields.fieldText: Unable to Complete the Service Appointment as status is other then onsite OR Parent Record is other then WorkOrder.

fields.name: ValidationError
fields.fieldText: Please do Passenger Release before Closing WO since it is an Entrapment/Possible Entrapment.
